circumstances: The crew was performing a local training mission at Altus AFB. After landing, smoke spread in the cockpit and a fire erupted. The crew immediately stopped the aircraft and the runway and evacuated the cabin safely. There were no injuries while the aircraft was totally destroyed by fire.
probable_cause: It was determined that UHF cables which runs near the aft wing root in the fuselage were melted due to an electrical fault. Fuel vapors in the area of the aft body tank ignited.
